name: Nutty Puppy Chow
author: Becky Beckmann
summary: My Grams would always make this recipe for Christmas. I can't help but to make it more often with roasted peanuts and confectioners' sugar. Oh so good. You gotta try this one.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package crispy corn and rice cereal (such as Crispix®)
directions: Melt butter, chocolate chips, and peanut butter together in a saucepan over medium-low heat, stirring until smooth, 5 to 10 minutes
Mix peanuts, cereal, and raisins together in a large bowl
Pour chocolate mixture over peanut-cereal mixture; toss to coat
Place 2 cups confectioners' sugar in a large covered container; add coated cereal mixture and remaining 2 cups confectioners' sugar
Cover the container and shake until cereal mixture is well coated with confectioners' sugar
